ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Survey - System standards and Performance
ygData.msgSnippet: And now for the home version: ... Talies the Wanderer Check out the EverQuesting Bard: http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
ygData.messageBody:
And now for the home version:

At 10:36 AM 7/26/00 -0500, I wrote:
>Computer Specs for Bards
>
>CPU: P3 333
>RAM: 128 MB
>Video Card (and RAM): V3 2000
>Video Resolution: 800x600
>Sound Card: Soundblaster Live X-Gamer
>HD speed (rpm): 7200
>'Net speed: DSL
>Geographic Location: Houston, TX
>Options enabled or disabled:
> Sky texturing: Double layer
> Particle Effects: On
> Mip Mapping: Off
>Clip plane distance: Full
>
>How many songs can you twist? 3 - nearly 4
>Do you slow down when it rains? No
>How about in Unrest or Kunark? Sometimes

Talies the Wanderer
Check out the EverQuesting Bard:
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
